title: Integrations API

detailed_design.description: Wire adapters (Google Workspace, Pinterest) into /api/integrations. Consolidate GMail (sentinel), Pinterest (knowledge_graph), scaffold Integrations into single Integrations concept.
detailed_design.solution: 1. Wire google_adapter to /api/integrations. 2. Add Pinterest integration status. 3. Replace Vercel/Supabase placeholders with real connector status. 4. Load integrations from config.

acceptance_criteria: Google Workspace (Gmail, Calendar, Drive) status in /api/integrations
SettingsPanel Integrations tab shows real status

user_stories.story: As a user, I want to see which external services are connected.
As a user, I want to connect my Google account for Gmail/Calendar/Drive.

technical_notes.current_issue: Integrations return Vercel/Supabase placeholder; Google adapter exists but not wired
